title: Only allowed to attack when you're over 90 workers! | ICYFAR #5
excerpt: This weeks ICYFAR: In every attack at least half your attacking army needs to be dropped. Submit replays to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Latest submission is before the monday(US/EU) / tuesday(AUS) daily. Full Playlist of Daily VoDs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFUDU8AOevUdOq5x--TBFC-p54CMWM4Fb
